txt.en: 'Have you stood upon our walls and looked out? I have, often, and in the last days I have seen scouts of the foe brazenly keeping watch. If they are so brazen, they may bring report that we are vulnerable to attack. If they attack us in force, we will surely fall.\n\n'If only someone would go out there and give those scouts a lesson in humility and decorum, I feel sure they would think twice about venturing close enough to stare us in the eyes.'
Defeat some of the Variag scouts who linger outside the walls of Ost Rimmon.
You should tell Lady Glánhar that you have defeated a number of scouts outside of Ost Rimmon.
'Struck some fear into the hearts of those brazen scouts outside our walls, have you? That is well. Perhaps, just perhaps, with all I have put in place we will weather this storm.'
Strike some fear into the heart of the Variag scouts who have been watching Ost Rimmon.
